Name: Boxplosion
About the game: A both intense and relaxing particle simulation for VR. Experience hundreds of thousands of seemingly living particles. Use VR controllers to interact with different particle systems, or create your own using the editor. For Vive and Oculus Rift. Key Game Features: Experience up to 250,000 particles with physics. Emit, interact with the particles and control time, using your VR controllers. Create your own scenes with the in-game editor. Change 3d models, skies, lights, materials, emitters. Export Gif animations and screenshots.
